channel.title: Bags on madewhere
channel.description: Recent content in Bags on madewhere

item.title: The Level Collective
item.description: The Leval Collective is a backpack and clothing manufacturer based in Cornwall.

item.title: ROAM Luggage
item.description: ROAM Luggage manufactures custom rolling luggage and backpacks in the USA.

item.title: Waterfield
item.description: Waterfield is a San Francisco based bag manufacturer. They manufacture a variety of backpacks, messenger bags, totes, and video game console cases.

item.title: Trakke
item.description: Trakke is a Scottish waxed canvas bag manufacturer; they supply a variety of backpacks, messenger bags, and slings from their Glasgow workshop.

item.title: Tanner Goods
item.description: Tanner Goods is a leather goods manufacturer based in Portland, OR. They produce a range of belts, wallets, bags, and other accessories. While Tanner’s core products are produced in the USA, they do not exclusively carry US-made products.

item.title: North St.
item.description: North St. is a cycling bag maker in Portland, Oregon. They make backpacks, panniers, handlebar bags, etc. They’ve also started making more hiking focused gear. Many of their products are made to order.

item.title: Mission Workshop
item.description: Mission Workshop is a San Francisco-based maker of bags and technical clothing; they focused mostly on bike gear, but have since diversified into more technical wear.

item.title: Heath Ceramics
item.description: Heath Ceramics is primarily known for their ceramic products, but they also act as a vendor for a wide variety of items which appear to be from reasonable sources. They list origin of products they carry prominently on individual product pages.

item.title: Heath Ceramics
item.description: Heath Ceramics is primarily known for ceramic goods which they make in their California factory. They’ve recently started producing other products, like flatware. They also carry a significant number of other items which seem carefully selected, but haven’t been comprehensively evaluated. See their vendor page for more information.

item.title: Graf Lantz
item.description: Graf Lantz is a Los Angeles manufacturer. They make a large number of items for the home and office, as well as bags and other accessories; it spans items like desk mats, sunglass cases, tote bags, face masks, etc.
